author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Arctic Liquid Freezer III on Amazon - https://geni.us/NrMtDT
In this hardware news episode, NVIDIA addresses the supply and demand situation by saying it has sold "2x" the amount of RTX 50 series GPUs as 40 series. Also related to NVIDIA, there have been rumors of missing ROPS on upcoming laptops, rumors of RTX 5050 and 5060 or 5060 Ti GPUs, and news of its hotfix to resolve flickering and stability issues. In other news, Meta says it's not a pirate, Thermal Grizzly is selling 9800X3D CPUs that are pre-delidded, and EA releases source code for early Command and Conquer games.

Watch the Thermal Grizzly delidding process: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYLUBvISa7I

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

Sources: https://www.one-tab.com/page/hu3MRp0KRBmo2g-I_G2New

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Recapping the Week
01:37 - NVIDIA Updates
title: HW News - More Missing ROPs, RTX 50 Supply Situation, EA Does Something Good, & Delidded 9800X3Ds
